trends: There have been no other sightings in Petaling Jaya
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: group of glowing objects moving in tandem with eac
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 8:23 pm, my brother5B witness 25D pointed out at the northern sky a group of lights which moved in tandem. Thelights were about the size of a star and moved in a group. The came from thenorth and slowly drifted towards a northwesterly direction. My first impressionwas a flight of airplanes flying in formation but the arrangement and speed wastoo slow and too synchronized for a flight of aircraft. I would like to know ifother Malaysians in the Petaling Jaya area reported the same thing.
